transcripts.text: Okay, so next up what I wanted to ask you about is I actually wanted to ask you about Destiny.  Now, when was the last time that you have spoken to Destiny?

I want to say... it was a long time ago.  It was probably over half a year ago, maybe a year ago.  And it was about, so there was, I did one stream with destiny with Hassan Piker and destiny.  And, you know, we spoke about a bunch of stuff.  We ended up debating a little bit about protectionism and free trade.  And, um, if my memory serves me correctly, maybe like two or three months after that, after we had that stream, somebody sent me a clip and it was like destiny taking like a pot shot at me or something and, And I forget exactly what he said, but it was something along the lines of like that.  my position on free trade was stupid.  And so I DM to him at the time and I was like, dude, listen, man, you know, if you have an issue with something I said or an opinion I have or whatever it might be, you can ask me for sources and I'll send them to you.  Like, there's.  no I have nothing against doing that.  I just found it really strange that somebody would go out there and take.  what felt like a really gratuitous shot out of nowhere against me.  Like, again, I've, I've no problem at all with him having philosophical or policy disagreements with me by any stretch of the imagination.  In fact, I encourage that.  I like watching stuff where people disagree with me and make their, their case for it.  But it was the way that he did it where he like called it stupid or something like that.  And it was super dismissive and glib that I, I DM him.  And I was like, dude, listen, man, I'm a fan of your content.  I like your stuff.  You've done great work, de-radicalizing people from the alt-right.  And like, Basically, I was saying, I respect you, so maybe show a little bit of respect back.  And if you have any questions about beliefs I have, just ask me about it instead of sniping in the way that he did.  And his response was basically something like, I'm sorry, man.  He didn't say I'm sorry, but he's like, I love you, buddy.  Basically, I didn't mean anything by it kind of stuff.  That was his reaction.  And I was totally happy with that.  I was fine.  It is what it is.  But I haven't spoken to him for at least six months, maybe a year.  I think he got banned or something again on Twitter.  um and yeah so that was basically the end of that.
how do you feel about the turn that he has taken uh over the past like i don't know six to eight months basically right after you spoke to him?

yeah um yeah i i don't.  i obviously don't agree with him as much now as i did before this recent you know this couple months turn that he made uh what were some of the things that really led to where he is now.  Do you know?  Because I haven't followed it as closely as you, so I don't know.
Do you mean what caused him to say those things?
